animeTitle: Issho ni Training: Training with Hinako
animeDescription: "First muscle training animation ever," a 16-year-old girl named Hinako leads exercises in push-ups, sit-ups, and squats. Hinako was once a human, but she was turned into an anime character when she was a second-year middle-school student.   (Source: ANN)
animeRelated: ['Issho ni Sleeping: Sleeping with Hinako', 'Issho ni Training Ofuro: Bathtime with Hinako & Hiyoko']
